sentence: what ground transportation is available in charlotte
sq2:
SELECT DISTINCT  '"'||v0.airport_code||'"', '"'||v0.transport_type||'"',
 '"'||v1.city_code||'"', '"'||v1.city_name||'"' FROM ground_service v0,
 city v1 
WHERE ((v0.city_code = ANY v1.city_code) 
AND (v1.city_name = 'CHARLOTTE'));
sql: ( SELECT DISTINCT GROUND_SERVICE.CITY_CODE , GROUND_SERVICE.AIRPORT_CODE , GROUND_SERVICE.TRANSPORT_TYPE FROM GROUND_SERVICE WHERE GROUND_SERVICE . CITY_CODE IN ( SELECT CITY . CITY_CODE FROM CITY WHERE CITY.CITY_NAME = ' CHARLOTTE ' ) ) ;
